# argyle
An `R` package for import, QC and (some) analysis of genotyping and hybridization-intensity data from Illumina Infinium arrays.

## Usage
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(argyle)

data(snps)
geno <- read.beadstudio("sample", snps, in.path = "./")
```
